name: Dear Reader
description:
Dear Reader lets you curl up and play your favorite books, turning classic literature into clever word puzzles. Unscramble passages from famous books, unlock unique puzzles, and add new books to your library.

Dear Reader includes 76 literary classics and dozens of different word puzzles, from unscrambling anagrams to swapping lines of text. As far as we know, this is the first game where you can dive in and play with the actual written words from so many tempting books.

And it's fun! As Gamasutra's Alissa McAloon wrote, Dear Reader is "a game that’s as difficult to put down as a good book."
